CustomField.description: Formula to compute the scoring before insert and after update
CustomField.formula: "FORMULA NO MORE USED - TO BE DELETED" /* IF( ( IF(ISNUMBER(Q07Answer__c),VALUE(Q07Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q08Answer__c),VALUE(Q08Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q09Answer__c),VALUE(Q09Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q10Answer__c),VALUE(Q10Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q11Answer__c),VALUE(Q11Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q12Answer__c),VALUE(Q12Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q13Answer__c),VALUE(Q13Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q14Answer__c),VALUE(Q14Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q15Answer__c),VALUE(Q15Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q16Answer__c),VALUE(Q16Answer__c) < 7,false) ) && ( IF(ISNUMBER(Q02Answer__c),VALUE(Q02Answer__c) < 7,false) || IF(ISNUMBER(Q03Answer__c),VALUE(Q03Answer__c) < 7,false) ), "Recovery Act", IF( IF(ISNUMBER(Q03Answer__c),VALUE(Q03Answer__c) > 8,false), "Promoter", "Neutral" ) ) */
CustomField.label: Tech AfterSales Scoring Formula
